text: Heroism on command, senseless violence, and all the loathsome nonsense that goes by the name of patriotism - how passionately I hate them!
author: Albert Einstein

text: Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism.
author: George Washington

text: You'll never have a quiet world till you knock the patriotism out of the human race.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.
author: Bob Dylan

text: What this country needs what every country needs occasionally is a good hard bloody war to revive the vice of patriotism on which its existence as a nation depends.
author: Ambrose Bierce
